document.title: Proton Transport
document.abstract: The investigation of the molecular-level mechanisms of proton transport in diverse systems is a research project advised by David Keffer (Chemical and Biomolecular Engineering, University of Tennessee). The structures shown on this page are the work of Ms. Myvizhi Esai Selvan, a PhD student at the University of TN.
document.publication-title: Faculty Publications and Other Works -- Chemical and Biomolecular Engineering

field.name: custom_citation
field.value: Computational Materials Research Group; Keffer, David J.; and Selvan, Myvizhi Esai (2010). Proton Transport. Chemical and Biomolecular Engineering Publications and Other Works. http://trace.tennessee.edu/utk_chembiopubs/69
